sequence:
The Melancholy of a Princess Chevalier

<size=45>Chapter 6 - Feuding Sisters</size>

scripts.say: Port - Commander's Office
Commander, I've come to deliver the resources that came in earlier!
You're here too, Le Triomphant? Congratulations on your secretaryship!
Ehehe. It's no big deal~
Good timing. I'd like to ask you something about you and Le Mars.
About me and Le Mars?
C-Commander?!
I had no idea... Le Triomphant is always brimming with confidence, even with so many things to worry about...
If you ask me though... I'd say that she's overthinking things.
Huh...?
I heard Forbin calling for me! Huh? Le Triomphant too?
Good day, Miss Le Mars.
Um, so it's like this... Commander is asking us for advice about when your sister ship is in an opposing faction.
That's the issue, huh? Well, it's perfectly normal for siblings to fight, right?
Really?
Le Mars is a blockhead, so that's the only method you can use to get to her anyway.
I've actually tried it a bunch of times in combat. Using practice equipment, anyway.
Anyway, all you gotta do is hit 'em with your feelings! Use words for stuff that can be conveyed with words. Use your fists for all the stuff that can't!
Sigh... that's why you're a blockhead...
Who the heck are you callin' a blockhead?
W-well, I'm glad you two get along... but I wonder if I can have this kind of relationship with my sisters...
You have a point. There's no guarantee with this kind of stuff, but don't you think it's better to express yourself than to keep your emotions bottled up?
They're your sister ships after all. I'm sure they'll understand if you talk to them. Someone as smart as you can figure that out, right?
My sister ships...
Miss Forbin, Miss Le Mars, thank you both for your advice. I think I understand a bit better.
It seemed like Le Triomphant's heart was finally beginning to thaw.
